meanings.sent1: The pteranodons soared gracefully through the sky.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the fossils of pteranodons to learn more about ancient flying creatures.
meanings.sent3: The pteranodons had a family reunion in the museum.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination took flight like a flock of pteranodons.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the size of the pteranodons' wings.

meanings.definition: Pteranodons: flying reptiles of the late Cretaceous period
meanings.sent1: Many pteranodons glided over the ocean searching for fish.
meanings.sent2: The discovery of pteranodon fossils helped scientists understand prehistoric ecosystems.
meanings.sent3: The pteranodons organized a flying competition for fun.
meanings.sent4: The pteranodons' shadows danced on the forest floor as they flew overhead.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit brought the world of pteranodons to life for visitors.
